metadata.dc:author: Jiménez Martínez, A
Castells Rodellas, A
Ramón Quiles, D
Betlloch Mas, I
metadata.dc:description: We report herein a case of Acquired Immunodeficiency Syndrome in a 38 years old man with Kaposi's sarcoma, which evolution was fulminant in some months. The clinical, pathological and pathogenic characteristics of Kaposi's sarcoma in this syndrome are discussed.
metadata.dc:title: Sarcoma de Kaposi como primera manifestación de un SIDA.
[Kaposi's sarcoma as the first manifestation of AIDS].
